jcr:content.jcr:title: ’23/’24 Outerwear Guide
jcr:content.pageProperty_description: The best outerwear of the ’23/’24 ski & snowboard season. Explore our Gearheads’ top picks: skiing & snowboarding jackets, pants, bibs, helmets, goggles, winter accessories, baselayers, midlayers, and more.

text_294269145_copy_.text:
Helmets & Goggles

Protection to keep you covered all season and proper optics for catching mountain views, too.

text_294269145_copy__1883822718.text:
Outerwear

This year’s best gear to keep your body dry—and spirits high—from the season’s first laps to its final tracks.

teaser_1794064492_co_1752061618.jcr:description:
Backcountry Cottonwoods GORE-TEX Jacket & Bibs

Characterized by durability and hardiness, the Cottonwoods kit has a canvas-like construction that will live through all of winter's harshness. This year, we updated the fit with a more comfortable and movement-friendly profile based on community feedback. And it's built with all the small details that make a huge difference: tons of intelligently placed pockets, an internal cloth for defogging goggles, fully waterproof construction, proper ventilation, and a colorway collaboration with our friends at the Japan-based brand, Manastash.

teaser_1794064492_co_1525776647.jcr:description:
Backcountry Cardiac GORE-TEX PRO Jacket & Pants

We built this kit to solve every pain point we’ve run into with other outerwear. It’ll regulate your temps during uphill climbs or downhill rips. 3-layer GORE-TEX laminate delivers best-in-class weather protection (without restricting movement or comfort) that pairs easily with other layers. And clever details like the pass-specific pocket, built-in goggle wipe, glove-friendly zippers, and other intelligent pocket placements let you solely focus on carving joy out of winter.
